flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to keep his total time at 300 or below because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=300>>300
His total time spent in the other mazes is 200 because 4 x 50 = <<4*50=200>>200
His total time spent in the five mazes thus far is 254 because 200 + 45 = <<200+45=254>>254
He can spend 46 more minutes on this maze before his average go above 60 because 300 - 254 = <<300-254=46>>46

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 245, not 254. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
